known_issues: Obstacles and boss obstacles become invisible when time is over.
When time is over, the game should display a "Time up!" message but currently does not.

existing_features.title: Ensure regular obstacles and boss obstacles remain visible (do not disappear unexpectedly) when the level timer reaches 0 and the game transitions out of the 'playing' state (e.g., into 'exploding' and then 'gameover').
Add a distinct 'time expired' game-over reason and display a clear 'TIME UP!' message when the countdown reaches 0 (different from other loss conditions such as hitting the border).

projectName: Fix obstacle visibility at time end and show 'Time up!' message
